org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.document.options.navigation

Interface DocumentStoreEntityContext<E extends DocumentStoreEntityContext<E,P>,P extends DocumentStorePropertyContext<E,P>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntityContext<E,P>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CouchDBEntityContext, MongoDBEntityContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseDocumentStoreEntityContext, CouchDBEntityContextImpl, MongoDBEntityContextImpl

    public interface DocumentStoreEntityContext<E extends DocumentStoreEntityContext<E,P>,P extends DocumentStorePropertyContext<E,P>>
extends EntityContext<E,P>
    Allows to configure document store options applying on a per-entity level. These options can be overridden for single properties.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E associationStorage(AssociationStorageType associationStorage)
      Specifies how associations of the configured entity should be persisted.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.EntityContext

        entity, property

    • Method Detail

      • associationStorage

        E associationStorage(AssociationStorageType associationStorage)
        Specifies how associations of the configured entity should be persisted.
        Parameters:
        associationStorage - the association storage type to be used when not configured on the property level. Overrides any settings on the global level.
        Returns:
        this context, allowing for further fluent API invocations
